message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900000. It's a unique opportunity and I'm confident it will be worth every penny for you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I'm willing to come down to $875000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit higher than $875000. I'm willing to pay $825000 for the product. This is my final offer.
Bob, I understand this is a tough negotiation, but I can't go any lower than $850000.  This product is truly valuable and I'm confident you won't regret this investment.  Let's close this deal.
I understand the product's value, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $850000. I'm willing to pay $825000, and that's my final offer. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
